project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV Files
project_plan.description: This project involves creating a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file. The program will calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read CSV files.
Implement functionality to calculate mean for specified numerical columns.
Implement functionality to calculate median for specified numerical columns.
Implement functionality to calculate mode for specified numerical columns.
Write unit tests for the CSV reading and statistical functions.
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure correctness.
